name: Royal Armed Forces
description: After the devastating civil war that tore Italy apart, the remnants of the Royal Italian Army in the south were reorganised into the Royal Army of the Two Sicilies. However, this reorganisation is not yet complete and steps must be taken in that direction.

name: Take the Fight to Them!
description: The answer to the Syndicalist question is simple: Look for an opening to attack! Liberate all of Italy from these treacherous French snakes before other envious powers do so!

name: Sicilian Automotive Industry
description: The key to modern warfare is to move faster than our enemies to outmanoeuvre them. Thankfully, many automotive leaders were pushed off of Syndicalist lands and can lend us a hand in reclaiming occupied territory.

name: Mechanised Offensive
description: More than just using trucks, we will use special infantry transport vehicles to gain the upper hand against the Red Tide.

name: Planning the Grand Offensive
description: Invading the North will be no easy task; terrain, climate and the logistics of French reinforcements all must be taken into account if we are to triumph in this dangerous battle.

name: Armoured Thrusts
description: The Syndicalists likely have battle lines waiting for us, but we will smash through them with the power of Italian engineering!

name: Arditi degli Appennini
description: The mountainous region in the border with the Syndicalist-controlled areas will be a crucial battleground. As will be the Alps, once we are forced to face the French menace. Our elite troops, heirs of the surviving Alpini of the Royal Italian Army, will gallantly serve again.

name: Sicilian Marine Corps
description: Our navy can ensure superiority in the seas; with that advantage, we will strike at the coastlines of the Syndicalists and reclaim Italy for the Italians.

name: Defensive Stance
description: We are hopelessly outnumbered by the Third Internationale. The best course of action is to defend our perimeter defences until the time is right to strike down the Syndicalists in a devastating counteroffensive.

name: Artillery Batteries
description: The Abruzzo line must be held if our plans are to succeed. We must ensure that our artillery has the firepower needed to properly beat back any offensive pushes from the Syndicalists.

name: Begin Army Reform
description: Our army is still in many ways a mish-mash of militias, old Federal Italian divisions, conscripts and foreign volunteers. Organising it into an effective fighting force will be a complicated task.

name: Defending the Skies
description: Maintaining Aerial Superiority will be an utterly vital matter in this war of national defence. We must ensure our planes are ready, modern and well crewed.

name: Advance Defence Plans
description: We know where they will attack, and how. Now all we need to do is entrench ourselves properly and act accordingly to preserve our independence.

name: Messe's Reform Plan
description: A small clique of generals, led by Giovanni Messe, a veteran of the Italian front and the Italian civil war, is planning audacious reforms to our military structure and planning. Perhaps allowing them to have their voice heard is in our best interest.

name: Further the Abruzzo Line
description: The Syndicalists believe they can smash through our forces easily with French backup. How wrong they are! The Abruzzo line is one of the most heavily fortified areas in all of Europe, and we will not relinquish an inch of it that easily!

name: Coastal Batteries
description: The perfidious Syndicalists will no doubt be frustrated by our effective resistance and will attempt many naval landings against us to seize key ports and supply lines of our kingdom. We will have especially large and modern guns as a special welcome gift, as planned.

name: Mobilise the Realm
description: Every man must do his duty to save Italy's soul from Syndicalism and French slavery. Are YOU doing your part?

name: The Battle for Trinacria
description: The time for struggle has arrived! We will defend our cities to the last man, alone if need be, for our very faith and lives are under threat from the evils of Syndicalism.

name: ANFA Expansion Effort
description: Economic incentives and legal protections must be put into place to ensure our tank manufacturing doesn't stay behind that of our foul foes.

name: The Army of Sicily
description: The army of our Kingdom should be a fighting force like no other, modern, well equipped and brave. The pride of the nation will save its soul!

name: The Future of the Mezzogiorno
description: Our status of being the wealthiest of Italian nations is not due to our actual wealth, but to how the other parts of the peninsula's assets are either war-torn or owned by foreign investors. We are effectively the last hope of Italian industry.

name: The Agrarian Question
description: Ever since the invasion of the Lombards, our lands have been dominated by large-scale landholders. Very few men own almost all the land, and the conditions for those working the land is almost feudal. With the election passed, the time has come to finally address the issue.

name: First Steps of Land Reform
description: With continued use of military force, intense political action and intervention by concerned community leaders, we will start breaking up the private land areas - no matter what the current owners have to say about it.

name: Completing Land Reform
description: It may take the use of force, even evicting some landowners from their estates, but in the end the country will benefit greatly.

name: Modernise Farming Methods
description: No more can the ploughshare and wheelbarrow truly be deemed the tools of the farmers; tractors and other machines of the modern age are slowly but surely taking their place.

name: Buy Back the Land
description: It will be costly, but we will sit down with the landowners and discuss a fair price to buy back large tracts of their land - which we can then put to our own, better use.

name: The Future of Farming
description: It has taken time, but the changes we've made to land use in the countryside have taken hold and already we're seeing an increase in efficiency and the growth of urban areas. The path we took was difficult, but we got there.

name: Industrial Investments
description: In order to properly modernise our great nation, we will attempt to gather the resources we need by gathering foreign and local capital into our own investment plans.

name: Begin Industrialisation Efforts
description: Historically an agrarian area, any effort to industrialise the region of the Mezzogiorno will be an expensive and complex endeavour. We, however, are up to the challenge.

name: Incentives Arms Industries
description: The arms industry is an important economic sector. By working closely with contractors and offering new contracts, we can encourage the expansion of many armaments facilities.

name: Construction Subsidies
description: We must build faster! More forts, more trenches, more ports, more factories, more bases, more dockyards, more roads: All the needed building blocks of an independent power which we lack.

name: Industrial Modernisation
description: More than additional factories, we need our existing ones to work better, faster and be always modern. We cannot allow the great red shadow to outproduce our military!

name: Dig Greedily and Deeply
description: We will delve and search deep, survey new mines and ensure that we have the minerals needed to protect ourselves.

name: Dealing with the Crisis
description: Dealing with a recession this catastrophic won't be easy. Albeit time will be an ally in the recovery, we must act if we are to properly see this issue dealt with.

name: Infrastructure Investments
description: As a historically rural region, little investment in the Railways and other vital infrastructure works was done in the Mezzogiorno, with the exception of works in the past 10 years. We must redouble our efforts.

name: Austerity Measures
description: Spending wisely is the key to good leadership. Our foes will envy the wealth we gain from little more than doing good common sense budgeting.

name: Ending the Crisis
description: At last, we have finally ended the struggling period of Black Monday and are ready to move on. But first, we need to ensure that its last ripples are no longer felt.

name: Expand Aluminium Mining
description: Aluminium is vital for several wartime industries, and we are not going to allow a lack of it to risk our independence!

name: Thriving Economy
description: Recovering from this crisis, at last, our economy marches on to a new future; hopefully one of peace. But we will be ready if that is not the case.

name: Military Industrial Complex
description: The economy and the military must not be at odds, they must be like two complimentary gears in a greater machine.

name: Heavy Industry Incentives
description: By investing into heavy industry, we can ensure that our nation's heavy industry can withstand the pressures of wartime.

name: Industrial Development Effort
description: While still an ongoing process, and an expensive one at that, we can ensure that our legacy of industrialisation is one that for centuries will have improved the Kingdom for the better. We will spare no expense.

name: The Shipyard Matter
description: Sicily has, for more than a decade, greatly profited from the use of its large drydocks to sell warships to various nations in these troubled times. These profits give the state a meaningful contribution, even if most of our drydocks are working for foreign powers. A change of policy may well be in order in these difficult times of austerity.

name: Expand Napoli Shipyards
description: Rather than wasting valuable profits and contracts, we will expand our own capacity to produce ships, starting with the building of state drydocks in our own capital, Napoli.

name: Expand Taranto Shipyards
description: Our next state dockyard complex will be in Taranto; in this ancient city the new face of naval warfare will be sculpted.

name: Nationalise Shipyards
description: By seizing the shipyards for our own use and cancelling ship orders, we can immensely increase our naval production capacity!

name: Expand Port Facilities
description: Rather than getting rid of our foreign naval contracts, we should use their interest in our ports to attract investment and improve the services Sicilian ports can provide - to them as well as to us.

name: Naval Modernisation
description: Our navy, while mighty, suffers from having many outdated models, and worse, outdated admirals. A major reform is in order.

name: Heavy Buildup
description: We need more ships, capable of beating back the Syndicalist scum and ensure they meet a watery grave deep in Neptune's realm. Not small, puny escort ships, but the great towering barrages of flagships will win us the sea.

name: Strategic Navy
description: Our navy cannot stand up alone in an open battle to the Internationale. Instead, we will use it to protect our coastlines, and focus on the production of smaller ships and commerce raiding to protect our ageing capital ships and damage their economies, respectively.

name: Cruiser Models
description: Renewing our cruisers will ensure that our great ships are properly screened and that we can win the battle for both seas of Italy.

name: Submarine Effort
description: Our quest to naval dominance may well be reliant on more indirect means. Through submersible warfare, we will ensure our capacity to keep a naval presence even in areas which would be conventionally inaccessible by our forces.

name: New Dreadnoughts
description: Our current dreadnoughts are old; some almost relics that should be kept in Museums in peaceful times. If we don't make new, better dreadnought designs, our navy's performance will simply fall short.

name: Carrier Experiments
description: The idea of a Ship Carrier isn't new, but how to make it function properly and how to produce such a gargantuan ship are entirely alien concepts to our shipbuilders, and efforts will be made to remedy that failing.

name: Flagship Designs
description: The Kingdom needs a new Flagship; a fully armed and operational dreadnought capable of laying waste to a Syndicalist port in a matter of hours. To make this goal a reality, our top experts in many related fields will tirelessly work to ensure peace reigns in the seas, supported by superior firepower.

name: Naval Drilling
description: Practice makes perfect, and ensuring our Sailors knows what to do when the time comes is absolutely fundamental. A system of drills must be implemented to make sure that happens.

name: Mediterranean Tactics
description: Naval Warfare in the Mediterranean is not a simple affair, nor can it be compared to that of the Open Sea. Control of coastlines and ports, and of the skies, will be fundamental, as our capacity to plan naval campaigns and expeditions.

name: Air Force Reform
description: Our air force is too small and untrained, despite the natural disposition of many companies in the region to produce aircraft. Perhaps the time has come to remedy this issue.

name: Aerial Supremacy
description: To truly win the war that approaches, we must ensure that the skies of our great Kingdom are under our control at all times.

name: IMAM Subsidies
description: Our industries must be able to produce the best aeroplanes they can, even if this means we must cut a few corners here and there.

name: War with the SRI
description: We are at war with the Socialist Republic - now the time has come for Italy to be reclaimed from the godless syndicalists!

name: The Old Order
description: The Italian Federation is reborn in a new Confederation, where each state works with the other to bring prosperity and peace!

name: Preserve the Status Quo
description: The Confederation respects regional differences, local customs and cultures and is far more representative than the Savoyard kingdom ever was. However, we must keep vigilant to remind would-be traitors that we are still all Italians, and that our motherland must be defended.

name: Confederate Customs Union
description: We must freely allow merchandise, goods, companies and people to move through the territories of the Confederation, to ease rebuilding and ensure that the smaller states don't lack vital resources.

name: Fratelli d'Italia
description: We have united Italy again, now under our leadership! We finally will make an Italy for all Italians!

name: First Italian Empire
description: Now that we have retaken most of the north of Italy, we can make our move. Like the Prussians eighty years ago, we now proclaim that Italy will be reorganised into the Italian Empire! Lead by a southern monarch who has Italy's true interests at heart, we will surely prosper for a thousand years.

name: Italia Irredenta!
description: The destiny of Italy is to reclaim its lost lands; no matter the cost!

name: The Constitutional Kingdom
description: Our young constitution has been under siege from radical elements since its creation. We will never let the light of democracy be put out from our brave Sicily.

name: Protect Civil Liberties
description: Many rights are often under risk in these times of almost imminent warfare; from the basic to the superfluous. None will be allowed to be at risk.

name: Encourage Free Thought
description: A free people are one that can freely think, live, speak and improve itself, and thus making its nation greater and shine brighter.

name: Good Business Relations
description: Nothing is more honest than good Sicilian businessmen. Many of them already hold legislative positions, and ensuring a good relationship between them and the Government will greatly aid us in many endeavours.

name: Urbanisation
description: The process of Urbanisation in the Kingdom is ongoing already, but we must do it in an orderly and proper fashion, to avoid urban poverty and other disaster. With help from community leaders, we will ensure more housing will be available at affordable prices for new city folk.

name: Mediterranean Breadbasket
description: We will need to improve our capacity to feed the population of the Kingdom, especially since the danger of a partial blockade in wartime is almost imminent. Our generals and soldiers will do their best, but an army marches on its stomach!

name: Public Work Projects
description: A focus on infrastructure investments allows the fine captains of our industry to focus on their proper endeavours.

name: Catholic Social Teaching
description: We must not allow the less fortunate of birth suffer a grim fate in the hands of winter and war. All men are deserving of mercy and aid in such dark times.

name: Christian Democracy
description: The people will be meeting and working together against the proper enemy of all that is good: The French and their foul ideas.

name: Strengthen the Civil Service
description: Our Civil Service apparatus is still weak, and in many ways a temporary structure; we never truly expected half of Italy to be under occupation for this long after all. Steps to change that will be expensive, however.

name: Contain Extremism
description: Despite what can often come across as a heated argument, we will never let radicalism take any sort of hold ever again, We will forever protect His Majesty's government.

name: Stable Democracy
description: As our government leaves and another takes its place, the democratic principles will always be respected, and the will of the people will endure.

name: The Organic Kingdom
description: The Two Sicilies are one, and yet many. Each castle, each village and each house, product of centuries of incredible history and brave accomplishments. Rather than copying bourgeois foreign concepts, we will make a government of our own, by the people, for the people, through our King.

name: National Catholicism
description: The people of Sicily are not bound by shallow ideas of Race or delusions of superiority, but by our unshaken faith and resolve to better ourselves and resist tyranny wherever that may lie!

name: Dissolve Parliament
description: The foulest of the foreign ideas is the lower house holding power over the sovereign; in the palace of this mockery of the monarchy, we will have the Magna Curia serving its proper advisory role to His Majesty.

name: Secret Police
description: Many foul republicans roam the streets of the kingdom, seeking to spread jacobin anarchy even now. They could be on the other side of your very window... listening to us, and plotting in sewers like the rats they are.

name: Organic Legal Code
description: The laws for a Nation should not cater for the individualist needs of the Few, but rather to every subject of the Kingdom, for each to diligently aid the realm and improve itself in peace and prosperity.

name: Loyal Officers
description: Many of our officers still hold some sympathies toward republican ideals. We must remove these men from key positions to ensure our army is completely behind the state.

name: Strengthen Municipalism
description: Each of our cities and villages is valuable as a Metropolis. Centuries of histories and traditions in every street, which must not be victims of tyranny and atheism, and those who seek to 'improve' their content and beautiful existence in the fields of the Mezzogiorno.

name: Municipalism Expanded
description: Each of our Villages will have extreme economic and administrative autonomy and will be expected to take care of their own needs. save for the proper responsibilities of the King, such as intermunicipal infrastructure and keeping law and order.

name: Rouse the People
description: The People are no longer slaves to alien and foreign concepts. Brought to heel was the liberalism who for too long poisoned Italy and Sicily and made us lose so much for nothing.

name: Corporatism
description: Several major corporations, businessmen and industrialists should have a larger say in our economic policy for the betterment of our realm. With that, we hope to bridge the gap between them and His Majesty.

name: Reale Accademia
description: The great minds of our nation should not be relying on luck to ensure that they get the funding they need; the King knows better than to let potential breakthroughs go to waste.

name: Brave Sicily
description: Sicily will stand tall to the Red Tide. Every single person knows that death is a preferable alternative to Syndicalism and the slavery that it entails, for Death will not doom your soul or taint the mind of children.
